values:
I just wanted to post and let everyone know that I have to leave the island. Its not something I want to do or am happy about, but some RL things have come up that are seriously important and will be taking up most if not all of my time for quite a while. I know this has happened at a most inopportune time for me and Gwen, but thankfully I have her support with this decision. She has been wonderfully through all of it and I couldnt be more greatful. She is truly an amazing woman. I will be leaving my email open in case anyone needs to or would like to email me. 
Thats Josh_Hartnett_frp@yahoo.com            
Thank you everyone for the great times and memories I had here on the island. I consider all of you my friends. 
~Josh Hartnett
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/9452.html

::frowns:: Gwen woke up really sick this morning. She thinks she ate too mych last night, and..maybe shes right. I just feel so helpless when she sick. I wish I could do more for her. She's outside right now getting some air, trying to feel better. And Im lounging in bed, just being a loaf. I think she thinks I went back to sleep, but I took this moment to update. ::smiles softly:: We have had a great time here. It sad that we only have one day left. But tomorrow we head off to Walt Disney World, and I couldnt be happier. I was thinking for today we would take this Jeep safari I have heard so much about and then I was thinking about taking her on the helicopter tour they have here. They said its really beautiful, it gives you a chance to look down on the whole island. I was sorta thinking also about going horseback riding, but with Gwen feeling sick and all, maybe we should put that off, and just go see them. ::grins:: The horses here are beautiful. Perfect, even. LIke the kind you see in the movies and in paintings. Gorgeous animals. Well, I think I might take another quick nap while shes out there, and then get our day started if shes up to it. ::closing my journal and huddling under the covers, falling back asleep::
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/9199.html

Well today is day three of our trip to Bora Bora, tomorrow unfortunately is our last, but then we are off to out second part of the honeymoon...Walt Disney World. Sugar has never been there before and it is a place very dear to me and I want to experience being there with her. I cant wait to see how she likes it. I hope she loves it. And its good to get Little One there too, Daddy will be bringing her there alot. And its never too early to get started. ::laughs::
This morning we slept in later than we had planned, but that worked out just fine ::grins:: SPent some time in our bungalow just enjoying each other, Gwen is just so beautiful. Its hard to let go of her for just one second. After that we walked to a nearby village and had breakfast at a little stand, just some fruit, nothing too heavy. Gwen has been starting too feel a little nauseous lately, so we thought it best to take it easy this morning. After we ate, we went on a four wheel drive safari which was just incredible. We made sure it wasnt going to be too turbulent for her before we took part, but it was a really smooth trip for the most part. Its really neat. Its a two and a half hour tour that brings you to these valleys and mountains that you can climb and explore that are only accessible by taking these vehicles. It was so beautiful. It offers a great view of the island from many perspectives. We got some great shots, we will have to post them later. After that we went on a Catamaran cruise. Now that was exciting! It was only about 40 minutes but boy! can those boats go fast, and its actually pretty scary at times. But it was an experience. ::grins:: Gwen was screaming so loudly when the boat goes up on its side. It was so cute. Well, thats really it for now. Gwen is taking a nap, and i think I might go join her before going out tonight. ::closes journal and walks over to the bed, climbing in beside Gwen and wrapping my arms around her pulling her closer to me::
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/8880.html

Today was our first full day in Bora Bora, and it was amazing. We woke bright and early and had breakfast delivered to us by boat. Its a really neat experiance. After breakfast we went for a dip in our freshwater pool to help wake us up, and then I surprised Gwen. I had rented a boat and a provate island, so we could spend most of the day snorkeling together, just the two of us. It was amazing. I got to touch a mana ray, and we saw some sea turtles and all sorts of fish and corals. I never imagined that the oceans were so beautiful you know? You hear about it, but to actually experiance it yourself, its just breathtaking. After we got out of the water, I brought her to the other side of the island where I had had a picnic set up for her, all on a huge sky blue and lavender blanket. It was really romantic, just the two of us, under the huge blue shy, just holding each other and doing nothing. The world was ours. It was incredible. AFter spending some time on the island, romping around the beach and whatnot ::grins::, we headed back to land and took a glass bottomed boat tour which was really neat. The whole floor of this boat is glass and you can see everything under you. We saw a few sharks even, it was so neat. And being able to talk to some other vacationers was fun too because it gave us ideas of what we could do the rest of the time we are here. After the boatride, we went to a small village just a little bit away from our bungalows and shopped for some souveneirs, and some gifts for our Little One. The locals are really nice and they are willing to talk about almost anything with you, which was also helpful in finding out what is fun to do around here. After that we went back to our bungalow and took showers to wash off all the sand we had acquired from earlier, and then just stayed inside doing honeymoon stuff. ::grins devilishly:: Tonight I thought we would just order dinner and have it boated over here, and spend the rest of the night indoors...or maybe in our pool. Havent decided yet. Hey, maybe both. Well I have to get goig, Gwen is calling for me from the hottub.
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/8661.html

::looks over at Gwen, lounging on a beach towel on the sand of our private beach, working on a tan:: We arrived at Bore Bora around 1 in the afternoon today. The flight was fun. (Thank you Lance for letting us use your private jet, it was a wonderful time and a smooth flight) It gave us some time to talk about what we had planned for our honeymoon and what he had planned for our future, and I was able to catch a nap as well, which was nice, since I spent so much time last night packing and whatnot. As the plane was landing we caught glimpses of Bora Bora and it is simply beautiful. The water is so crystal clear, I have never seen anything like it before, its really awesome. The sand is so white and the sun was shining, its heaven here, I can tell already. We are staying in a bungalow which is set further away from the cluster of them, so we have alot of privacy ::grins:: and our own little beach, which is very fun. There is also a freshwater pool right near us which we took advantage of right away and went swimming in nothing but our birthday suits. ::beams:: My Sugar has an amazing body and she is so graceful in the water. She continues to always take my breath away. After going swimming, we finally decided to unpack and go exploring. There are a couple of really neat patches of water to go snorkling which is definately something we are interested in doing, and alot of little hidden coves and "love nooks" which really add to the romance of this whole place. We havent done alot so far because we wanted this first day for "relaxing" and what not ::grins devilishly:: But tomorrow we will definately take advantage of all this island has to offer. The only real thing I have planned for tonight is a candlelite dinner right on the water for my Sugar. I just want to be able to look at her gorgeous face in the candlelight and tell her how much I love her. She really is my everything. I am so glad I am here with her. Its perfect. Well, Gwen is motioning for me and I cant keep the missus waiting for me ::grins:: Ill update more later.
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/8367.html

Your Years at Hogwarts by nevermindless
Name:
The Sorting Hat places you in: Slytherin (Green and Silver)
Subject you are naturally best at: All of them.
Your favorite book: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them by: Newt Scamander
Pet you bring to school: Wood Owl, Mottled
You are most known for: Being Prof. Lockhart's favorite student.
Created with quill18's MemeGen!
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/8105.html

Well the past two days have been very busy and very exciting. Thursday night Gwen and I finally made it official. Gwen and I were married during a lovely ceremony which almost all of our friends were able to attend, which made it all the more special to us. Abbie, it was especially wonderful that you were able to attend. It made the evening perfect, it wouldnt have been the same without you. The wedding was followed by a beautiful reception at Lance and Kim's home. Kim, you did an amazing job, everything was picture perfect. 
Tonight Gwen and I had our first pre-natal appointment. We found out we are just a little over 5 weeks along, so our Little One is so far expected to make her big entrance on Labor Day. As Gwen said, what a perfect day to have a baby. ::laughs:: I had alot of questions, and Dr Karter happily answered them, but there are still so many things that I dont know. But I have some time yet before I have to know.
::looking around the bedroom, and my clothes scattered about:: Gwen, the beautiful woman she is, is already packed. Me, on the other hand, have no clue what to bring. I dont know why I am being so picky, normally I wouldnt care what I looked like. But it is our honeymoon, and I want everything to be perfect for her. She has done so much for me and our relationship since we have met, she works so hard in so many ways, I want to give her this honeymoon as a time to relax, reflect, and just enjoy herself. I love her, and I just hope everything goes smoothly. 
Our flight leaves bright and early at 5 am. ::cringes at the sound of such an early hour:: But Tahiti isnt a hop skip and a jump away so I will be able to catch a few extra Zzz's on the way there hopefully. We are staying in a really neat Bungalow which is built right about the water. In some spots on  the floor you can see right through to the water, its really incredible. Ill post more about this once we get there and get settled. RIght now though, I have to start packing, or I will never get done by the time we have to leave for the airport.
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/7922.html

table border='1' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='2' align='center'>
The World Is MINE! by DemonacName:You will conquer:the Entire World, excluding Quebec and Ohio.Your title will be:FuhrerYou will succeed by:Building a giant Weather machine.Your Enforcers will be:Smart-mouthed Robots (from MST3K).Your first act as ruler:Destroy every company you ever worked for.Created with quill18's MemeGen!
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/7473.html

Tonight is the night. In just a few hours I can officially say that Gwen is my wife and we are married. Im so very excited and so nervous. The day just seems to be dragging on and on, I hope the time will start to pass by faster. ::smiles:: Last night the guys threw me a bachelor party ::laughs:: Boy some of the things I got! Definately creative. ::laughs again:: I dont know where they came up with some of that stuff, but if anything, it will keep Gwen and I...entertained. ::grins:: To Justin, Paul, and everyone else that could not make it, thank you for thinking about me and wanting to be there. That truly means alot. I know during the week may not have been the best time for such a party, but it was alot of fun and I wish you all could have been there. The night was also good because I was able to meet some new guys on the island who I hadnt had a chance to meet yet. All in all, it was a great time. Oh, and Justin, I was thinking about naming her Justine. ::dies:: 
Well, all there is for me to do now is try and relax and make sure the honeymoon is all in order, my vows are all in order, and I am all in order. ::takes a deep breath:: Actually maybe I will go for a run on the beach, so I can try to calm these nerves of mine. Hope to see everyone tonight!
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/7206.html

Your Love Situation by Amberishjewel
Username?
Your Love Is...Sweet
During Lovemaking You Act...Like a child, always playing
Your Partner Is...Your slave
Your Partner Has Said That You...Are their favorite person
Your Love is Summed Up In A Quote."Love is bittersweet"
Created with quill18's MemeGen!
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/7062.html
Thank you Jami for the background! Its beautiful. And the icon is great too. I look...contemplative. ::laughs:: I guess its a nice look for me. ::smiles::
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/6875.html

In just three more days, the love of my life will be walking towards me and forever becoming my wife. I cant even begin to explain how I am feeling about all of this. Excited, anxious, nervous, thrilled...too many feelings for words. My life seems to be falling into place, and I couldnt be happier. After being away for a few weeks (thank you Buffy, the trip was wonderful. My brother and I had a great time) it is nice to be home, to be able to see familiar faces again, and be with those who mean the world to me. As much fun as my vacation was, I was counting the days until I could be home again, with my Sugar, and our "Little one". ::smiles:: I cant believe that I am actually going to be a father. This has been a dream of mine for so long now, and its finally coming true. Its just so hard to believe. Im incredibally excited of our little one's arrival, I just wish it didnt take nine months. ::laughs:: I dont know if I can wait that long. I have a little feeling in me that our little one is going to be the little girl I have always dreamed of. I dont know why, exactally, its just this feeling I have. But you know what? If he is a boy, I will be equally as thrilled, and proud, and overjoyed. Im in love with little one already. Every night I kiss Gwen's stomach goodnight. ::sighs happily:: It will be amazing once she has started to show. I think it will make this amazing happening seem all the more real. 
Getting back to our wedding, I have asked Buffy to stand with me at the service. To be my best-lady if you will. Since of course, she cannot be a best man. ::chuckles:: She has happily accepted and I am thrilled. She has meant so much to me this whole time I have been here on the island. She has been a true friend and has stuck with me through thick and thin. I just cant see anyone up being there with me right now. She means a great deal to me. Thank you again.
I am still making the final touches on my vows, which I think have come along quite nicely. How do you put how you are feeling into words? Its not easy, but I think I have done a good job, and I hope Gwen loves them. They are words from the heart; my heart to hers. Our honeytmoon arrangements are almost complete as well. This was quite the challenge for me. I am just a big kid who likes to go places and have a great time. But I know that honey moons should be somewhere romantic and special. So I think I have come up with the perfect places. I hope she likes them. 
As for right now, I have a ton of laundry to do and some things to pick up from the store. I hope everyone had a Happy New Year, and continues to have one!
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/6544.html

My apologies for being so late with this. ::grins::
*The look on her face when I tell her I love her
*The way her hair blows over her face when its breezy outside
*Sitting on the beach, holding her hand, doing absolutely nothing
*Talking about our future together
*The way just the sound of her voice makes my day
*The way we trust and love each other
*When she whispers things in my ear
*When she follows through with what shes whispering in my ear ::winks::
*Soft gentle kisses, that grow intense as the night goes on
*Watching ourselves in the bedroom mirror 
*When she takes over and I am at her command
*The way we become one when we reach that special moment
*The look on her face that tells me shes satisfied
*Those nights when we wear absolutely nothing but each other
*Knowing that she is the woman I will be spending the rest of my life with
*Knowing that we have created a special little life
*The way she makes me feel just by looking at her

I love you, Sugar
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/6162.html

Christmas has always been my favorite holiday. And now there is a further reason for that. Today I proposed marriage to Gwen, and she accepted. I am so happy. I do not even know how to put into words how I feel about that woman. She is amazing, she challenges me, makes me think, makes me laugh, make me strive to be a better person. I know spending the rest of my life with her, will make me complete. She is the woman I have always been looking for, and I have finally found her. 
The engagement was special. It was among friends and family at the hotel tonight during the Christmas party, and I wouldnt have wanted it any other way. Our friends our special and mean the world to both of us, and with a special occasion such as this, I didnt feel that it would be right to celebrate it without them there. Thank you all for your congratulations and support. It really means alot to me, and to Gwen as well. 
I look forward to Gwen being my wife, and myself her husband. I look forward to a house full of children running around making us smile, making us laugh...this all seems not just like a dream, but a dream come true. 
Thank you Gwen for being my friend, for being my lover, and for accepting to be my wife. You have made me the happiest man in the world. I love you!
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/5993.html

I figured now would be the best time to post this since I really don't want to wait any longer. Lately Gwen and I have been spending a whole lot of time together, talking, sharing our thoughts and dreams, our passions, and we both realised just how much we have in common. I know, speaking for myself, that she makes me incredably happy. I feel complete when Im with her, she fills in a part of my heart that was missing something before. Of course I wish that things could have been different from the beginning, but in the end everything works out. And Gwen and I will work out. I can feel it in my heart and in my soul. Gwen, all I hope for, is to make you happy and make you feel loved how you deserve and want to be loved.  I love you
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/5884.html
I never meant to hurt you. I am so sorry for all and any pain I have put you through. It was never my intention for things to work out this way. I wish nothing but the best for you. Im sorry
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/5589.html

Ugh. Mondays are the worst. I had two finals today, and I had to take them on three hours of sleep. Then I had to go to work. Taking a break from acting was okay, but I have bills to pay and a degree to get so Ive still been unfortunately very busy. Thankfully though, I have been able to be on the island alot more lately, rekindling some friendships, and making them much, much better, as well as making new ones. I always miss out on so much while Im gone. I have to stop that! ::smiles::

Life has a funny way of working out. Just when you think you have everything all figured out, something comes around and makes you question everything you stand for. Not necessarily a bad thing either.  Only time will tell though. I have always been afraid of hurting people, its something I never want to do. Im scared I will end up doing that and I dont want too. I want to be happy though...right now Im    confused and stressed. I have so many different thoughts going through my head right now, I doubt if this entry makes much sense. Oh well ::shrugs:: I do the best I can. Im a guy, what do I know about expressing myself? ::chuckles::
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/5359.html

Christmas certainly snuck up on me this year. Christmas on the island is just 6 days away. I still need to do some Christmas shopping. Fortunately, I did get the house ocmpletely decorated, and the kitchen smells like Christmas cookies, so Im getting somewhere. I just dread shopping. Im not one for malls as it is, and when they are crowded like this..ugh. I despise it. I guess Im your typical male when it comes to shopping. If I could do it all online, yay! But I waited too long and now I must go to ::gasp::..the mall. 

I feel so confused. But at the same time I feel, really really good.
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/4957.html

I have a million thoughts running through my head. Sometimes life just gets...complicated you know? And I am at a point where I dont know what to do. I know in the end, I will do what is best, but its coming to that decision that is always hard. I have faith that someone will see me through all of this and I will come out a happier and stronger person. ::smiles as Sora and my two kittens hop up onto my bed:: The new kittens certainly like their new home, especially the huge Christmas tree in the living room, which they have made it a habit to climb up and knock all of my ornaments down. ::chuckles:: But they certainly have added some more liveliness to the house, and they keep my busy, which is what I wanted. My semester is almost over, which is another blessing, now I will be able to be here on the island more come the 20th when all of my finals are done. ::sighs looking at the never ending stack of books which now are lying on the floor beside my bed:: I love history, dont get me wrong, but lately when I read, these books are putting me to sleep. I think I have over worked myself. Stayed up too late studying..or something. Lets see...I finally filled out a survey, so check that out if you care to know anything about me ::laughs:: if not, I understand. I know Im not the most exciting male on the island. ::smiles:: Oh! And congratulations Orlando! Im very excited for you. I think Josh is a great name for a boy, dont you? ::smiles:: Well, Im really exhausted, so Im going to catch some shut-eye. More later
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/4737.html

Name:Joshua Daniel Hartnett

Vital Statistics (dob,ht,wt,measurements,whatever):July 21, 1978,  6'3'', brown eyes, brown hair

Likes:Jazz, Blues, Batman, Hockey, being with friends 

Dislikes: eating meat, when my private life becomes public unwillingly 

Hobbies: Playing football, watching movies, baking pies ::grins::

What is your idea of a romantic evening?: Cooking dinner for that special someone, cuddling outside looking at the stars, and having a good ocnversation

What turns you on?: A great personality and a great smile

If someone wanted to make an impression on you, what's the one thing they could do or say that would completely TURN YOU OFF RIGHT AWAY?: People that are very closed minded and conceited

Which mode of transportation decribes you best (limo,car,truck,cab,etc): Hmm...

What dessert are you?: Pumpkin Pie

What do you notice first in a person of the opposite sex?: Smile, eyes

What is your favorite memory?: Friday nights with my family as a kid, we would just watch movies all night, pig out on pizza and bond

What is your most embarassing moment?: Wow. I have one almost every day ::chuckles::

Is there something about you that no one else knows?: Of course

What movie character would you trade places with?: Jimmy Stewart's character George Bailey from "Its a Wonderful Life"

Do you KISS on the first date?: Its hard to say, sometimes things just happen

Do you do OTHER things on the first date?:No

Do you even have to GO on a date?: ::smiles:: Dates are nice

What are your favorite kinds of foods?: ANything vegetarian and of course pizza

What will you NOT eat?: Meat

Share something from your heart:
My friends and my family are the only things I need in this world. I would be lost without them. I love you all
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/4588.html

ALthough I did it wrong. I dont know how to do the background thing right. This was the best I can do. ::laughs:: But I guess its hot anyways. Just joking. If anyone could help me out that would be great. My journal was looking kind of drab compared to everyone else's.
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/4317.html

I had some time off tonight and decided it would be a good idea to come home and start decorating for Christmas, since it will be here before we know it. I almost have all of my shopping done too, just a few more things I have to pick up for my Angel and I can officially say that Im done. ::smiles as I pull out a string of tangled lights:: I got my tree this morning, its huge and fat, I think its great. I hope it fits through the front door though, or I'll have to keep my tree outside this year ::chuckles:: I think I will wait for Buffy to be around, so she can put the Angel on top. It just seems appropriate. As far as I can see I will be able to be here for Christmas. Im so greatful for that, its been really hard for me to be around lately with school and work. But soon I will have a break, and can come home and spend some much needed time with all of my friends and meet all of the new members of the island. ::jumps up as my two new kittens jump into a box of ornaments:: Gotta go, or theres gonna be a real big mess to pick up soon
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/3969.html

http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/3738.html

since I have written in this thing. And its been a while since I have been home on the island. I have been taking some classes on the mainland and finals are coming up so Ive been pretty busy studying and making sure I know what I have to know. After the 20th though Im all done, and will come home, finally for more than just a day at a time. Christmas is my favorite time of year. The music, the friends and family, the snow if you have it...being with the one you love. I want to make Christmas very special for my Angel. To show her that I love her and to thank her for being patient while I get all of this school business worked out. She has been so understanding and I know this has not been easy for her. Sometimes I feel that she would be better off if we took a break, so she wouldnt have to be so lonely..I realise too that that would break my heart. ::looks over at the huge pile of books spread out on my bed and groans:: It seems like it will take me forever to read all of these books. I miss you baby, I will see you soon.
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/3578.html

Its definately been a while since Ive written in this thing. Im sorry I havent been around much lately. Alot of RL stuff going on thats been keeping me tied up for the whole week and it looks almost the same next week as well. Baby, I will do my best to run into you this weekend. I really miss you, more than you know. Its so hard to be away from you like this, I would do anything at this point just to hear your voice. I miss everyone to be honest. I cant help but feel Im not being very fair not being around so much, I cant leave the Island though, I wont. I love it and everyone here too much. RL will only be on my case for another week I suppose (I hope) then I can venture back home and spend some much needed time with my Angel and some much needed time with the rest of my friends as well. I have my ornament all ready for when I come home, so I can place it on the tree. I wish I could have been home for the celebration..Im missing out on everything it seems. ::sighs and scratches my head:: Well, I guess I dont have much else to update on since I havent been doing too much. Talk to everyone later.
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/3149.html

Stuck on the mainland one more night because of a terrible snow storm. My Thanksgiving was good, it was nice to be home and visit my family and friends again. I miss them when Im on the island. I ate myself silly and watched football, all that jazz. It would have been better if Buffy had been there though. I miss her so much, Im aching, my heart is aching, just to see her again. Babygirls, I love you and I miss you. I hope you are doing well. I have some work in RL this week which is quite unfortunate, Tues and Fri I believe I dont get out until 12:20 am and Mon, Wed, Sat, Sun I dont get out until 10 or 11. My Angel, I know how upsetting this RL work is for you it kills me too because I want to be with you every second of the day. I hope we can work through this, I feel too strongly for you to just give up. We will work something out, we just have too! ::looks at my watch, sighing:: I was supposed to be back home now, my baby girl in my arms...::shakes head:: SOmetimes life just throws you these curves and all you can do is work  through them the best you can, as hard as they might be. Anyways, Im gonna curl up on this uncomfortable airport chair and try to catch some sleep.
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/2951.html

I dont really have much to update on, but felt I owed a lot of people apologies for not being around this weekend like orginally thought. RL kept me unfortunately busy, and I wasnt able to spend the time with Buffy that I wanted to or bring Gwen her pie..the list goes on and on. Baby, I'll make it up to you I promise. Sometimes these unfortunate things happen and there just isnt anything you can do about it. ::sighs:: 
To Tobey and Emi, Congratulations. I wish you the very best and am very happy for you both. I wish I could have been there to share your joyous occasion.
Well, I am going to go take a nap, and then maybe go for a walk on the beach. Baby, if you read this, Ill get in touch with you tonight! ::smiles at the thought of her::
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/2778.html

There needs to be more time in the day. I was planning on spending all night with my Angel, but as it turns out I have to be in the mainland all night because I have some script readings early in the morning. ::sigh:: I wish I could be around here more for her. I love her so much, I feel so guilty when I cant be here for her all of the time. Sometimes I am worried it will cause a strain on our relationship. I really hope it doesn't though. I dont know what Id do without her. She fills me up with so much love and happiness...its indescribable. Im hoping tomorrow will be a different story and I will be able to spend more time with her, without things getting in the way. I love you Angel.
Also, Gwen my deepest apologies for not being able to drop off your pie. I will make you a fresh one the minute Im back home tomorrow and bring it right over. 
Also, on the note of pies, I know I other people wanted pies as well, and Im sorry if I forgot. Feel free to leave me a message and Ill get those right out to you as well. ::smiles:: I need to learn to write things down, because sometimes I dont know where my mind wanders off too.

http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/2149.html

Well its been quite the busy week so far. I did something sort of daring, and asked Buffy for her hand in marriage. She said yes, but then after some talking we decided it is best to wait awhile before we jump into that so we can get to know each other better. So for anyone who was at the hotel the night we announced the engagement, it is put on hold for now, I just wanted to let everyone know. ::sighs:: I know this is the right thing to do, but everything feels so right when Im with her, like this is how its supposed to be. She makes me feel in ways I never thought I could feel before...I guess I just thought too much with my heart and not with my head. ::chuckles:: But I agree with her, I think it's probably better this way. 
And I guess I also wanted to apologize for my constant shyness whenever Im at the hotel. I have a hard time being very 'crazy' and whatnot. ::grins:: I guess I have to work on that a little bit. One of these days I will be the one who ends up naked...well, we will see. ::laughs::
I feel I need to update more, but it is so hard because I have been so busy. Im hoping that things will calm down more, so I will be able to spend more and more time here and get to know everyone a little better. 
Gwen- I just got back from the grocery store with all of the ingrediants for your pecan pie. Hopefully if I dont get around to it tonight I will have it done by tomorrow. 
Right now though I have a pile of laundry at least as tall as I am. So I think Im going to go and try to attack that first.
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/2026.html

::stands in the kitchen covered in flour trying to brush the flour out of Sora's fur:: Well I just finished 2 pies. Gwen's southern Pecan pie and Orlando's Apple pie is in the oven now. I made quite a mess doing so as well, I somehow managed to drop an entire bag of flour on my cat. ::shakes head, laughing:: No worries though, this was after the pies were done so there will be no cat fur in the pies. :)
Other than that there isnt much new to report. Just that Im really tired, and really need some sleep. Being a Housewife is hardwork!!
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/1639.html

This week has been the best week for me! And its only just begun. Buffy, you have no idea how happy you make me. I look forward every day to seeing your beautiful face. To many many more picnics. ::smiles::
Ive been able to get to the hotel a couple more times and have been able to meet some more people. I think slowly but surely Im opening up. It sure sucks being so shy though, I wish I was able to just open up right away you know? Oh well, in time I suppose. 
I have been thinking about putting a pool in the back of the house. I know the ocean is right there and all, but I love swimming at night, with nothing on. Its just so liberating. And Im not sure if doing that in the ocean in the pitch black of night is a good idea. Well its somthing to look into I suppose. 
::leans back against the headboard and thinks:: Ever since I have gotten to the island my life has been on the up and up. Im so happy here, I cant even imagine being anywhere else right now. This was definatley a good choice on my part. I finally feel at home here too. My house is all set up, I have great friends, I have Buffy in my life, and a family who loves me back home in Minnesota. I feel very fortunate. 
::yawns:: Being almost 5 in the morning I think I will go get some shut-eye. Ill post some more later.
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/1447.html

My apologies to everyone for not being around much this weekend. I had to go to the mainland so I could bring my cat to her vet for some shots and get a copy of her paperwork so hopefully I can find a vet around here. Plus some good friends back home threw me a little going away party and gave me some real nice things for my house. ::smiles:: Im going to miss seing them all the time, but Im glad to be making new ones on the Island. 
To Abbie and Matt, I heard your party was great! Ill definatley be at the next one. Sorry I couldnt make it this time, I definately wish I could have.
To Buffy, Im sorry I wasnt around much this weekend. I would have loved to go to lunch. I will definately be around more this week and get ahold of you as soon as I can. You can pick the place, anything you want to do as well. My treat.  ::smiles happily:: Thanks for being such a great friend. It has definatley helped me feel at home. 
I guess thats really all I can say for right now. Hopefully I will have something more interesting to post later.
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/1133.html

Well I was dubbed Housewife tonight, or was it PieBoy? Well, either way of the two I suppose I prefer Housewife. I dont mind baking pies. Hey if it makes people happy, isnt that what really matters? Besides there are so many people expecting babies ::beams:: they will sooner or later be craving a pie and now they know where to get one. 

::sighs:: I am a shy person. I dont think many people think that I look like I should be, but I am and I have a hard time fitting in for that reason. But I hope day by day I will get better at it. ::smiles:: I just want to be surrounded by friends. 

I stopped by Lance and Kim's tonight. Baby Jessica is so beautiful. ::smiles softly:: It has been a while since I have seen a baby, she looked so tiny! And boy can that girl burp! I was definately impressed! ::laughs:: Her parents love her so much and they love each other you can just feel the love and warmth when you are there, its incredible. I brought them over a vegetarian lasagna and yes a pie. Hopefully they enjoyed it.

I also talked to Buffy tonight. What an awesome woman she is! So easy to talk to and she always knows how to make me smile when I talk to her or when I am feeling down.  

Well not much new to report, have to get up early in the morning and do some shopping so I should be getting to bed. 
::yawns:: Until tomorrow, Goodnight
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/769.html

Today was a very busy day for me! I had to be up at 8am so I could take a shower, bake a pie, feed Sora, and get things ready for the movers. Once they arrived around 12 noon, it took over 3 hours to get just the boxes in. I have this habit of never throwing anything away, so believe me I have lots of stuff. After the boxes were in it took another two hours to move the furniture into their respectable rooms and then finally the movers were gone. I spent a little while unpacking and cleaning things the best I could on my own, and then Buffy, my lifesaver!, helped me unpack almost the rest of my things. I would have been lost without her. I had no idea where to put anything and she definatley helped me alot! Sometimes I feel that men are completely clueless when it comes to these kinds of things! But I must say, this guy is good at baking pies! I think that may become a weekend hobby for me. Men can bake too after all. ::Looks around the house:: This place is finally coming together and I couldnt be happier. It isnt taking as long as I hav envisioned it would, which is definately a good thing, seeing as I havent been able to make much of an appearance in the hotel yet. Which will change soon everyone! I still have many people to meet and get to know better. ::yawns:: Housework = hardwork. I havent felt this tired in a while. Tomorrow will be unpacking my little odds and ends and then the final cleaning. I was also thinking about getting a friend for Sora. This is a big house and I would love for her to have another cat to counce around the house with. If anyone knows of a good place let me know. It would be appreciated! Well Im off to take a nap. Or maybe even sleep through the night if Im lucky.  ::closes laptop and crawls into bed::
http://joshhartnettfrp.livejournal.com/563.html

Well I finally made my move to the island, and I couldn't be happier. I have met so many great people so far, it really is beginning to feel like home. After a few days of searching I have found the perfect place to call my own:  
http://chp6.coolhouseplans.com/details.html?pid=chp-13154&FoundID=24&sid=chp5
Its a little bit bigger than I truly need, but the two extra bedrooms will come in handy for when my family and friends come to visit. Or maybe Ill just give my cat Sora a room to herself. ::laughs:: Just a man and his cat. I am looking forward to getting settled in completely. The rest of my boxes and furniture should be here tomorrow around noon I hope, then after all of that madness, I will be able to come to the hotel more often and get to know everyone a little better. Many thanks to everyone who has helped me get settled in so far. I will not forget your kindness. ::Looks down at Sora rubing up against my leg:: Ah, the Queen of the house is hungry, and I should go feed her before the rubbing turns to scratches ::chuckles, and closes laptop::
